sn35.112:1.1: “Rupe, bhikkhave, anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.112:1.6: dhamme anabhijanam aparijanam avirajayam appajaham abhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.112:1.7: Rupe ca kho, bhikkhave, abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.112:1.12: dhamme abhijanam parijanam virajayam pajaham bhabbo dukkhakkhayaya”ti.
